# CSS Classes Reference

Complete list of CSS classes used by content components.

## Section Layout
- `.flashcard-section` - Flashcard section container
- `.faq-section` - FAQ section container  
- `.section-header` - Section header with title and actions
- `.section-actions` - Action button container
- `.empty-state` - Empty state message

## Buttons
- `button` - Base button style
- `.btn-primary` - Primary action button (blue)
- `.btn-delete` - Delete button (red)
- `.btn-exit` - Exit button (gray)
- `.btn-large` - Large button variant

## Flashcard Styles
- `.flashcard-list` - Grid container for flashcards
- `.flashcard` - Individual flashcard container
- `.flashcard.flipped` - Flipped state (showing back)
- `.flashcard-content` - Card content wrapper
- `.flashcard-front` - Front of card
- `.flashcard-back` - Back of card
- `.flashcard-back.hidden` - Hidden back
- `.flashcard-label` - Label text (Front/Back)
- `.flashcard-text` - Card content text
- `.flashcard-actions` - Edit/Delete button container

## FAQ Styles
- `.faq-list` - List container for FAQs
- `.faq-item` - Individual FAQ container
- `.faq-item.expanded` - Expanded state
- `.faq-question` - Question header (clickable)
- `.faq-icon` - Expand/collapse icon
- `.faq-question-text` - Question text
- `.faq-answer` - Answer container
- `.faq-answer.hidden` - Hidden answer
- `.faq-answer-text` - Answer text
- `.faq-actions` - Edit/Delete button container

## Form Styles
- `.flashcard-form` - Flashcard form container
- `.faq-form` - FAQ form container
- `.form-group` - Form field group
- `.form-actions` - Form button container

## Review Mode Styles
- `.review-mode` - Full-screen review container
- `.review-header` - Top header
- `.review-progress` - Progress indicator
- `.review-card` - Card display area
- `.review-card-front` - Front card section
- `.review-card-back` - Back card section
- `.review-label` - Question/Answer label
- `.review-text` - Card text
- `.review-controls` - Show Answer/Next buttons
- `.review-navigation` - Previous/Skip buttons
- `.review-empty` - Empty state for review

## Utility Styles
- `.error-message` - Error notification popup

## Animations
- `fadeIn` - Fade in animation (flashcard flip)
- `slideDown` - Slide down animation (FAQ expand)
- `slideUp` - Slide up animation (review answer)
- `slideIn` - Slide in animation (error message)

## Responsive Breakpoints
- Mobile: max-width 768px
  - Stacked section headers
  - Full-width buttons
  - Smaller text sizes
  - Reduced padding
